channel.title: Shops(need help)
channel.description:
heres my problem
I add this to client.java
[code]else if (NPCID == 1304) { // Dragon store PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 42; }[/code]
this to shops.cfg [code]shop = 42 Dragon_Armour_shop 2 2 1187 10 3140 10 4087 10 4585 10 1149 10 6585 10 6570 10 7461 10 4131 10 3204 10 4587 10 1305 10 6739 10 5730 10 3176 10 1434 10 1377 10 4585 10[/code]
and this to autospawn.cfg [code]spawn = 1304 3252 3432 0 0 0 0 1 2 pimpslapped[/code]
and he shows up where i want him to and stuff but it doesnt let me trade him and i dont know why!
could use some help please. =/

item.title: Shops(need help)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

oh right =p i hope that works lol , im trying to use hans XD

Read full topic

item.title: Shops(need help)
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

Idk, but try using a different NPC?

One that has the “Trade” option.

If that doesn’t work then when you “talk” with them, it should bring up the shop menu.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops(need help)
item.dc:creator: @Waterslasher Waterslasher
item.description:
@Waterslasher wrote:

search for wanneshop 3 in client.java, and make a copy of that whenver you can
eg: you find wanneshop 3 in client.java
you ccopy it, and paste it under it.
you edit it to your taste

Read full topic

item.title: Shops(need help)
item.dc:creator: @Waterslasher Waterslasher
item.description:
@Waterslasher wrote:

lol you forgot to add the shop itself into client.java
you just added who trades you the items from the shop

Read full topic

item.title: Shops(need help)
item.dc:creator: @BaaabyGames BaaabyGames
item.description:
@BaaabyGames wrote:

heres my problem

I add this to client.java

else if (NPCID == 1304) { // Dragon store PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 42; }

this to shops.cfg

shop = 42	Dragon_Armour_shop				2	2	1187	10	3140	10	4087	10	4585	10	1149	10	6585	10	6570	10	7461	10	4131	10	3204	10	4587	10	1305	10	6739	10	5730	10	3176	10	1434	10	1377	10	4585	10

and this to autospawn.cfg

spawn = 1304	3252	3432	0	0	0	0	1	2	pimpslapped

and he shows up where i want him to and stuff but it doesnt let me trade him and i dont know why!

could use some help please. =/
